sentence.Network_en: Before me was a catafalque, on which rested a corpse wrapped in funeral vestments.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个灵柩台出现在我面前, 上面躺着一个裹着葬服的尸体.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French, from Italian catafalco, of unknown origin. Compare with scaffold

means.word_mean: 1. a decorated bier on which a coffin rests in state during a funeral
